TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A drug that is used to treat gout and is used together with some antibiotics to make them work better. It is being studied in the treatment of cancer. It belongs to the family of drugs called antibiotic therapy adjuncts.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Medicamento usado para tratar la gota y se usa junto con algunos antibióticos para hacer que sean más eficaces. Está en estudio para el tratamiento de cáncer. Es un tipo de complemento del tratamiento antibiótico.
